## Size.(constructor)

Creates a Size object from the given width and height (floats).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(width: number, height: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  width | <code>number</code> | width of the new size |
|  height | <code>number</code> | height of the new size |
